ma melowata bihikala sadadaraniya maniyantath kawa powa athi dadi kala aadaraniya piyanantath ma mahanakamata yomu kala mage gnyathi sahodara siyambaalangamuwe kassapa swamindrayan wahansetath, siwuru patiya kare damamin mawa uthum wu prawrujya bhumiyata path kala siyambaalangamuwe shri gunarathanabhidhana nayaka swamindrayan wahansetath, gewi giya jiwitha kalaya thula ma aadarayen rakabalagath mage shishya puthrayin wahanselatath mage pawidi sahodarayantath mata siwupasayen upasthana karamin ledata dukata pihita wu sathara peruwe dayaka pinwathuntath, des wides pawidi gihi mithurantath punyanumodana karanawa.
me hudek aadarayama wiya yuthu na.

ohu wisin adhyakshanaya karana ladde da chithrapata thunaki.kaliyuga kale mulma chithrapatayayi.eya kaliyugakalam namin demala basin debas kawina.sara dewannayi.thunwanna arjuna ge wadathma janadaraya dinu chithrapatayayi.eya warthagatha aadayamak ipayuwa pamanak nowa ema wasare janadhipathi sammana ulele wadima sammana sankhyawak dina gannata da samath wiya.eyin pasu chithrapata nirmanaya no kala da arjuna mulu jiwitha kalaya purama sinamawen samugaththe natha.ohu sinama lokaye hithawathaku wiya.rasawathaku wiya.sinamawa sambandha siyalu katayuthu waladi arjuna ge yawathkalina danuma behewin prayojana wath wiya.

nihal pi.abesinhaawurudu 60ta wadi gowin 128000kata masakata rupiyal 5000 dakwa gowi wishrama watup gewima dan aarambha kara atha.mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma athin me wada piliwela aarambha wu bawath me anuwa 2014 janawari masaye sita aprel masaya dakwa rupiyal 20000k dakwa gowi wishrama watupa gowi janathawata himiwana bawath wishesha wyapruthi amathi ha aarthika sanwardhana niyojya amathi es.em.chandrasena mahatha pawasayi.uthuru nangenahira athulu sama palathakma aawaranaya wana paridi gowi wishrama watupata dayaka wu awurudu 60ta wadi siyalu gowinta gowi wishrama watup gewima mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage upades anuwa sarthakawa kriyathmaka wana bawath amathiwaraya kiya.me gowi wishrama watup kramaya anuwa rate gowin laksha 10kata pamana setha salasena bawath idiriyedi nokadawa gowi wishrama watup gewima kriyathmaka karana bawath amathiwaraya kiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
